sentences.english: The man took it and asked what he had to pay his shave.
sentences.chinese: 卖扫帚的人拿回了扫帚，随后问修面要付多少钱。

sentences.english: The man took it and asked what he had to pay his shave.
sentences.chinese: 卖扫帚的人拿回了扫帚，随后问修面要付多少钱。

sentences.english: Dropping my broom, hate yelling to rise.
sentences.chinese: 我扔下扫帚，恨恨地大喊起来。

sentences.english: Flying to the roof on a broom.
So I, with my push broom in hand, climbed the ramps.
sentences.chinese: 所以我手拿扫帚，爬上斜坡。

sentences.english: I can't sweep without a broom.
Faster than a turbo-powered broomstick, Harry Potter has started flying off the shelves.
sentences.chinese: 哈利波特开始飞下书架，速度比涡轮驱动的扫帚还快。

sentences.english: They were hard at it with brooms and mops .
sentences.chinese: 他们忙着用扫帚和拖把打扫卫生。

sentences.english: Here's another, Broom. This is a magazine just slightly later.
sentences.chinese: 这里有另外一本杂志叫《扫帚》，出版稍微晚点儿。

sentences.english: Thus, the two brothers with a broom and dustpan to sweep up the sun terrace.
sentences.chinese: 于是，兄弟两人拿着扫帚和畚箕，到阳台上去扫阳光。

sentences.english: When you fell, your broom sort of blew into the Whomping Willow.
sentences.chinese: 当你掉下来时，你的扫帚砸到了那棵打人柳。

sentences.english: Hence, two people of brothers take broom and dustpan, arriving veranda uping to sweep sunlight.
sentences.chinese: 于是，兄弟两人拿着扫帚和畚箕，到阳台上去扫阳光。

sentences.english: Fifteen brooms rose up, high, high into the air. They were off.
sentences.chinese: 十五支扫帚升了起来，高高耸起，比赛开始了。

sentences.english: I use a broom sweep floating snow, with racks for drying clothes, and bamboo cleaning high-level snow.
sentences.chinese: 我用扫帚扫浮雪，用晾衣架和竹竿打扫高层的雪。

sentences.english: Arrived the tea broom corn millet blooming.
sentences.chinese: 到达扫帚糜子盛开的茶。

sentences.english: Sometimes a black cat would ride away into the sky on the back of the witch's broom.
sentences.chinese: 有时候会出现黑猫骑在女巫扫帚后面飞向天空的造形。
